:{{A|VO Afanasi All Schemes to Know 01.ogg}} '''Afanasi:''' (Do these inspectors who come around every day think I'm with the Fatui? I'm really not!)

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Afanasi:''' An inspection today, and tomorrow too... Why is there one every day?
:{{DIcon}} Are you alright?
::'''Afanasi:''' Me? I'm okay. I'm holding up.
::'''Afanasi:''' I don't know why, but the port inspectors have been checking my goods every day.
::'''Afanasi:''' What I'm selling is clearly ordinary [[Snezhnaya]]n industrial goods though.
::'''Afanasi:''' But these inspectors seem to be always on edge, as if they are afraid of my wares exploding all of a sudden.
::'''Afanasi:''' Ah, I wish they would relax. These constant investigations will affect my business...
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Afanasi:''' When will they leave me alone...?
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
Afanasi, may be inspired by {{Lang|{{w|Afanasy Beloborodov}}|ru=Афанасий Белобородов|ru_rm={{#invoke:ru-rm|main|Афанасий Белобородов}}}} was a general in the Red Army during the Second World War who was twice awarded the title {{W|Hero of the Soviet Union}}.

Afanasi, may be a reference to Afanasi "Afonya" Barshchov, main character of movie [https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afonya Afonya].
